mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review VALUES ( seq_reviewno_no.NEXTVAL, #{shopno}, #{userno}, #{regno}, #{spoint}, #{sdesc}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select u.userName userName, r.spoint spoint, r.sdesc sdesc, to_char(r.regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from users u, review r where shopno = #{shopno} and u.userno = r.userno
